channel.title: Information
channel.description: In this section you can find various information

item.title: About new pricing, again
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
Prices are fixed again, the previous decision was reconsidered.
The new subscription prices are already listed on the website. The prices will be as they are until the time of sharp jumps in the market. Also, all users who bought at yesterday's prices got 5 days to their subscription.

item.title: About new pricing
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
Right now in our Discord channel there's news about price changes for the product, as well as a future update.
In a couple of hours we will additionally have a big key giveaway there, hurry up and go!

Discord - A New Way to Chat with Friends & Communities

Discord is the easiest way to communicate over voice, video, and text. Chat, hang out, and stay close with your friends and communities.
discord.gg

item.title: About Lifetime subscription
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
We would like to inform you that we have decided to remove the possibility of buying a subscription forever, instead of it there will be a subscription for a year. Next Monday, that is, on February 14, it will no longer be possible to buy it, if you were thinking about purchasing it in the near future - hurry up!
We also want to note that everyone who bought an lifetime subscription earlier will have it and will be with you until the end of the project.

item.title: Chinese New Year
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
We want to wish all Chinese a Happy New Year! Let it take place a little later than usual, but for you we have also prepared discounts on everything you can buy from us. The coupon code for the discount is NEW YEAR, the discount is 30% and is valid until February 3.

P. S Everyone can use the discount, not only those who celebrate the Chinese New Year

item.title: HAPPY NEW YEAR!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
So, the year 2021 is coming to an end, and for someone it may already have come (oh, this difference between time zones).

We wish you a happy New Year 2022! In the new year we will try to please you a little more than this year, we promise! We are not going to sum up any results, but we just sincerely want to wish everyone a wonderful holiday, no matter who you will be with, whether it's a celebration with your beloved family, or cozy gatherings with friends - be sure to have a good rest...

Read more

item.title: New Year
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
We are glad to welcome you! A New Year's mood was created in all our social networks and on the website. And in order to maintain it longer, we decided to arrange discounts on all our products again.

The coupon code for the discount is NEW YEAR, it will be 30%, as usual. And this action will last until January 20, that is, exactly a month.

We wish everyone a great mood and a good New Year's holidays.

item.title: Current information
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
We come to you with news!
A new payment method has been added to the site - Paymaster, with it it will be easier for you to purchase our product. At the moment, there is a payment via bank cards (QIWI virtual cards are also accepted), through the fast payment system and WebMoney. Payments via QIWI and YooMoney will also be added soon.

We would also like to comment on the future update of the cheat. We are currently working on fixing some issues and will be able to release it soon, stay tuned.

item.title: Discounts
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
Hello again! We would like to inform you that the discounts end at the end of this month, but this time the coupon code is already different - "11.11". This promotion continues thanks to a new event, World Shopping Day.

Also, if you can't buy a subscription through our built-in payment methods - you can pay for it through our resellers, they are now selling at a discount too

item.title: Discounts
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
HELLOween! In honor of Halloween we are holding a themed event with discounts on all our products. We have also changed the design of our website a little bit to match this event, we hope you like it.

Discount coupon is HALLOWEEN, it is 30%, so please keep an eye out for news!

item.title: About our software
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
We remind you that we write all the short news about problems and their solutions to the cheat in our Discord channel.
Subscribe, so as not to miss all the most important things that could make you understand the progress of our work - https://discord.gg/rddES5WJmG.

item.title: Discounts
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
In honor of the beginning of the new season, we decided to please all users of this forum with a 30% discount on all our products.
Discount coupon — SEP30.
You can use it there — https://legendware.pw/account/upgrades.

P. S. It will work for 14 days.

item.title: Legendware Official Discord server
item.author: invalid@example.com (CouZ)
item.dc:creator: CouZ
item.content:encoded:
Link - https://discord.gg/amzZJxt
LEGENDWARE
Get Brain.

item.title: About our HWID system
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
We want to remind you once again how our HWID system works. In order to reset the HWID , you need to run the loader on the computer on which you want to play with the cheat. Next, you will receive an error stating that your application for reset has been submitted for review and you do not need to write anywhere about it being reset, you only need to wait. The answer about the reset will be sent to you in a notification on the forum. The main thing we want to ask you is that you do not write...

Read more

item.title: Extra day & Information
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
All users with an active subscription were added 1 bonus day for recent problems on the forum.

P. S. The update is planned in the near future, do not worry.

item.title: Discounts
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
We decided to please you with discounts on our product due to the beginning of summer. The discount will be 15% on all our roles, and it will only be valid for 7 days. If you were planning to buy a subscription, but for some reason did not do it - now is the time!

The promo code for the discount is SUMMER. Enter it in the Coupon code field before selecting the role.

item.title: Some info & discount
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
Hello, we would like to go through the news.

Applications for beta testing are still being checked, there is no exact date for the final check, but after all the stages, we will send out messages on the forum.

We also want to please you with discounts on all roles on the forum, including a subscription to the cheat. The discount will be 30%, and it will be valid for the period from 1 (today) to 11 May.

Enter the promo code (MAY30) for the discount in the Coupon code input field before...

Read more

item.title: Applications for participation in beta testing
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
Welcome!

Due to the upcoming updates, we're announcing a set of beta testers, so that all future updates reach you, the end users, with a minimum of problems.

You can fill out the application using the LINK (You can submit an application within 2 days, until April 26, 10:00 PM UTC +3), after that the form will be automatically closed for new responses.
We ask everyone to fill it out as accurately and in detail as possible. We hope that you will become a part of our team of beta...

Read more

item.title: About last update
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
As many people have noticed, we are experiencing a considerable number of problems at the moment. This is due to the huge influx of users and many errors were simply not noticed before the release.

We would like to inform you that we are already aware of a huge number of errors and are diligently trying to solve them. Therefore, we ask you not to spam about them, but to give us time to analyze and correct them.

After solving most of the critical bugs, all users with an active subscription...

Read more

item.title: Extra days for users with an active subscription
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded: All users with an active subscription were added 20 days.

item.title: News about v4
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pelle)
item.dc:creator: Pelle
item.content:encoded:
At the current time, the payment problems have not been resolved. The release will also not be today, we apologize to those who waited and hoped so much, but in this state of affairs, we can not do everything on time, as not everything depends on us.
Stay in touch, all the news will be here.
